attributes.description:
For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877248549. This GWM flagship leisure double-cab is designed and packaged to appeal to those customers who want only the best, the most advanced safety features, the most user-friendly luxuries, power and economy in equal measure and design that forces you to look again! Adding to the visual appeal are neatly integrated LED strips, high-intensity projector-style headlamps. Other standard items include a neat audio system with USB/Aux support as well as Bluetooth, rear park assist, climate control and electric windows all-round. Another nice touch is a driver’s seat that is height-adjustable
Price Excludes On-The-Road-Fees and optional extras.
